import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TrackModel } from '@core/models/tracks.model'; import { MultimediaService } from '@shared/services/multimedia.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-card-player', templateUrl: './card-player.component.html', styleUrls: ['./card-player.component.css'] }) export class CardPlayerComponent implements OnInit { @Input() mode: 'small' | 'big' = 'small' @Input() track: TrackModel = { _id: 0, name: '', album: '', url: '', cover: '' }; constructor(private multimediaService: MultimediaService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } sendPlay(track: TrackModel): void { this.multimediaService.trackInfo$.next(track) } }
